EmailTemplate.name: SFP 2.2 Payment Notification for PC-RCD
EmailTemplate.subject: Payment notification for your work between the dates of 14th Feb - 1st March
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your staffing representative on {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c}.
Payment notification for your work between the dates of 14 Feb to 1st March.
Dear {!Job_placement__c.Contact_Name__c},
We hope that you have enjoyed your role on the NCS programme. We have processed payroll for your work on NCS: Personal Challenge - Get Active, NCS: Team Challenge - Get Involved, NCS: Real Challenge Design - Make Your Mark (one or more will be applicable to you).
Below is a summary of your approved payroll.
Pay for {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}
Your pay has been approved and your gross pay for this part of the role is {!Job_placement__c.Total_Amount_Paid__c}. This payment covers a total of {!Job_placement__c.days_worked__c} days. This is subject to tax and National Insurance contributions.
This pay constitutes your work between the dates of {!Job_placement__c.Assignment_start_date__c} and {!Job_placement__c.Assignment_end_date__c}. This allotment of work dates falls under payment period 1. Payroll date for this period is {!Job_placement__c.Payroll_payment_date__c}.
On your payslip (sent via email on {!Job_placement__c.Payroll_payment_date__c}), you will see the total amount which you will receive with any tax deductions listed.
Additional payments
If you are involved in working on the NCS: Real Challenge Action and/or NCS: Graduation for the February (Spring) programme, you will receive further payments and communications through our later payrolls.
Please note that you will receive a separate payment email for each day of NCS: Real Challenge Action and NCS: Graduation that you work. If you feel you should have received additional communications have but have not, please contact your local staffing team.
Due to new auto-enrolment legislation, employees of The Challenge, including seasonal staff, may be enrolled in a workplace pension scheme. For more information, including how to opt out, please see FAQs.
Any questions?
If you have any further questions about our payroll and payment schedules. please let us know quoting the email reference number in any correspondence. Best Wishes
The Challenge
Email Reference: SFP 2.1
